subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks Coach Mike Woodson usually prefers defense over offense, but on Friday, his two most prolific scorers, Carmelo Anthony and J.R. Smith, took turns torching the Mavericks.
snippet: Knicks Coach Mike Woodson usually prefers defense over offense, but on Friday, his two most prolific scorers, Carmelo Anthony and J.R. Smith, took turns torching the Mavericks.
